segments.text: I want to lose some weight !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a yoga class tomorrow . Do you want to come with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's too expensive for me . I've decided to take some exercises on my own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Run around the track . In the morning I run for an hour , and in the afternoon I run around the building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , I am sure it will work if you can persist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope so . Would you like to join me ?
segments.speaker: S2
